me nisa wishrama watup sandaha ayawayen wen kala yuthu mudala wasaren wasara ihala nanwena bawa amuthuwen kiwa yuthu naha. 1961 wasare miliyana 83k wu wishrama watup bila 2011 weddi miliyana 99,961 yi. 2050 weddi eya triliyana 4 k nathnam biliyana 4000 k dakwa ihala nanwenawa.

anith siyayata dahaya itu kirima sadaha pawichchi nokala nayakayeku thamata misa ratata aadaraya karana nayakayekayi mata piligatha nohaki ya mewani palakayeku wenas karaganimen pamanak paramadarshi
